nodes.text: Dantooine Express was a travel agency that was a member of the Galactic Tourist Bureau. Prior to the Battle of Yavin, the company offered "eco-adventure" trips to Dagobah, Hoth, Kashyyyk and Mustafar on board a fleet of customized StarSpeeder 1000s. At the time, Dantooine Express operated a spaceliner terminal on Spaceport THX1138's north wing.
